Easy to slip in a bag, perfectly airtight and light…The plastic MB Positive M bottle has many assets: in addition to its convenience, this reusable BPA-free* bottle enables to stay hydrated in all situations – at the office, at the gym, while taking a walk – and to take action on the environment by reducing one’s own personal use of disposable plastic water bottles. That’s one clever 50cl bottle! 

*In accordance with the regulations

titre: The compact insulated bottle - MB Pop blue Infinity
description: With its attractive stainless steel design, the MB Pop compact insulated bottle keeps your drinks hot or cold up for to 12h. Its sports cap and safety button, together with its practical pouring spout, make it the ideal choice in any situation! Its compact, easy-to-carry size is ideal for all handbags or sports bags, while its 360 ml capacity is perfect for enjoying fresh juices and steaming coffees, teas and chocolates. With its deep Infinity blue colour, you’ll just love using this to-go bottle in your day-to-day life!

titre: The thermo bottle - MB Steel graphic Jungle - nature - leaves
description: For all coffee, tea or only water at the right temperature desires, the MB Steel insulated bottle may be used at the office or when hiking. Made with stainless steel and equipped with a double wall, it keeps your drink warm or cold up to 12 hours and protect the hands from extreme temperatures. In addition, its integrated infuser facilitates the preparation of all infused drinks! A super handy insulated bottle which also got style!

titre: The smart insulated bottle - MB Genius black Onyx
description: Designed in stainless steel, the MB Genius insulated bottle will keep your drinks hot or cold for up to 12 hours (depending on the content and the conditions of use). Just shake to initiate the smart lid which will show the temperature of the bottle's contents (temperature in °C)! Whether in your bag or on your desk, the bottle shows the temperature of your favourite drinks before you enjoy them!

titre: The nomad cutlery set for lunch box - MB Pocket black Onyx
description: A fork, a knife, a spoon: that’s the necessary cutlery set to be as comfortable as at home when having lunch outside. That’s why none of these accessories is missing in the monbento reusable cutlery set! Designed in stainless steel and equipped with a plastic stand, this set is also very reliable and fit easily in the monbento bento boxes. A reliable partner for a lunch without boundaries.
